title: Watercress and tofu salad with sesame-soy dressing
ingredients: ['Salad dressing', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon chilli paste or chilli sauce', 'Salad', '150g watercress, torn or chopped', '150g firm tofu, sliced into cubes', '1 or 2 spring onions, finely chopped']
